name: Adrar
info: Adrar: A region in the southwest, known for its desert landscapes and traditional ksars.

name: Chlef
info: Chlef: A coastal province famous for agriculture, especially olive production, and beautiful beaches.

name: Laghouat
info: Laghouat: Known for its oases and gateway to the Sahara.

name: Oum El Bouaghi
info: Oum El Bouaghi: An agricultural hub in the northeast, known for wheat production.

name: Batna
info: Batna: Home to the Aures Mountains and Roman ruins like Timgad.

name: Béjaïa
info: Béjaïa: A coastal city known for its Kabyle culture and stunning beaches.

name: Biskra
info: Biskra: Famous for palm groves and as the 'Gateway to the Desert'.

name: Béchar
info: Béchar: Located in the Sahara, known for dates and music festivals.

name: Blida
info: Blida: Known as the 'City of Roses' with a scenic location at the base of the Atlas Mountains.

name: Bouira
info: Bouira: A region with beautiful landscapes and the famous Djurdjura National Park.

name: Tamanrasset
info: Tamanrasset: A desert town and hub for Saharan tourism and the Tuareg culture.

name: Tébessa
info: Tébessa: Known for its ancient Roman architecture and mining industry.

name: Tlemcen
info: Tlemcen: A cultural center with Andalusian influences and historic landmarks.

name: Tiaret
info: Tiaret: A highland city with historical links to the Berber Rustamid dynasty.

name: Tizi Ouzou
info: Tizi Ouzou: Heartland of the Kabyle people, known for cultural festivals.

name: Algiers
info: Algiers: The capital, known for its Ottoman-era architecture and vibrant city life.

name: Djelfa
info: Djelfa: Located on the Hautes Plaines, known for livestock farming.

name: Jijel
info: Jijel: A coastal area with beautiful beaches and diverse wildlife.

name: Sétif
info: Sétif: An economic hub known for agriculture and the Ain El Fouara fountain.

name: Saïda
info: Saïda: Known for its natural springs and pastoral landscapes.

name: Skikda
info: Skikda: A major port city with a mix of Roman ruins and modern industry.

name: Sidi Bel Abbès
info: Sidi Bel Abbès: A city with a strong colonial past and vibrant cultural scene.

name: Annaba
info: Annaba: Known for its beaches and proximity to the ancient city of Hippo Regius.

name: Guelma
info: Guelma: Home to ancient ruins and beautiful hot springs.

name: Constantine
info: Constantine: Known as the 'City of Bridges' due to its dramatic ravine crossings.

name: Médéa
info: Médéa: A region known for its vineyards and scenic views.

name: Mostaganem
info: Mostaganem: A coastal city with a blend of Andalusian culture and modern life.

name: M'Sila
info: M'Sila: Known for its proximity to the ancient city of Beni Hammad.

name: Mascara
info: Mascara: Famous for its vineyards and the birthplace of Emir Abdelkader.

name: Ouargla
info: Ouargla: An oasis city known for oil production and traditional markets.

name: Oran
info: Oran: Algeria's second-largest city, known for its music and vibrant nightlife.

name: El Bayadh
info: El Bayadh: A semi-desert region with pastoral traditions.

name: Illizi
info: Illizi: Known for its stunning Tassili n'Ajjer rock art.

name: Bordj Bou Arréridj
info: Bordj Bou Arréridj: An industrial hub, especially for electronics.

name: Boumerdès
info: Boumerdès: A coastal province known for its scenic beaches and historical sites.

name: El Tarf
info: El Tarf: Renowned for its beautiful Mediterranean coast and nature reserves.

name: Tindouf
info: Tindouf: Known for its vast desert landscapes and the Sahrawi refugee camps.

name: Tissemsilt
info: Tissemsilt: A mountainous region known for its rich history and cultural heritage.

name: El Oued
info: El Oued: Famous for its palm oases and as a center for traditional crafts.

name: Khenchela
info: Khenchela: Known for its mountainous terrain and rich agricultural land.

name: Souk Ahras
info: Souk Ahras: A region with rich historical significance and beautiful landscapes.

name: Tipaza
info: Tipaza: Known for its Roman ruins and beautiful coastal scenery.

name: Mila
info: Mila: Rich in history with numerous archaeological sites and a vibrant culture.

name: Aïn Defla
info: Aïn Defla: Known for its fertile plains and traditional agriculture.

name: Naama
info: Naama: A mountainous region famous for its natural beauty and wildlife.

name: Aïn Témouchent
info: Aïn Témouchent: A coastal region known for its agricultural products and beaches.

name: Ghardaïa
info: Ghardaïa: Known for its unique M'zab Valley and traditional architecture.

name: Relizane
info: Relizane: An important agricultural area with rich historical heritage.
